hero.subheader: Carriage is dedicated to making Cornell accessible for all students. We work with CULift, Cornellâ€™s paratransit service for students with disabilities, to build mobile and web platforms that improve the experience of scheduling, performing, and monitoring CULift rides for students, drivers, and administrators alike.

features.title: Rider Mobile & Web.
features.description: CULift riders can schedule and track their rides.

features.title: Driver Mobile.
features.description: CULift drivers can track rides and communicate progress with the dispatcher.

features.title: Admin Web.
features.description: CULift dispatchers can schedule and monitor rides, and SDS administrators can oversee service access and metrics.
